mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, password, email) VALUE(#{username}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user WHERE username = #{username});

select p.perms from power p left join in_role_power irp on p.id = irp.power_id left join role r on irp.role_id = r.id left join in_user_role iur on r.id = iur.role_id left join user u on u.id = iur.user_id where u.id = #{userId};
